topic.title: How to Change the Cover Page Using a Parameter

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse
author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.p: In the following example, a custom parameter is used to set the path of the cover page. The parameter points to an image by using its URL and is defined in the transformation scenario as:args.css.param.cover-page="file:/path/to/cover-page.svg"
